servinfo.title: Rear Drive Shaft Disassembly and Assembly

servinfosub.title: Disassembly
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to Front Drive Shaft Disassembly and Assembly:Front .

servinfosub.title: Assembly
servinfosub.ptxt: Assemble rear drive shaft assembly referring to Front Drive Shaft Disassembly and Assembly:Front and noting the following points which are different from that of the front drive shaft assembly.

item.ptxt: Apply grease to differential side joint.

spec.title: Grease specification for rear drive shaft differential side joint grease (2WD model and Motor-shift type 4WD model)
Grease specification for rear drive shaft differential side joint (Non-shift type 4WD model)

item.ptxt: Install tripod joint spider (1) on shaft by using special tool with hammer, directing its chamfered spline toward wheel side, and then fasten it with new snap ring (2) using snap ring plier (3).
Fit boot (1) to grooves of shaft and differential side joint (2), and adjust length to specification below.
Insert screw driver into boot, and allow air to enter boot so that air pressure in boot becomes the same as atmospheric pressure.

spec.title: Rear drive shaft boot fixing position “a” (2WD model and Motor-shift type 4WD model)
spec.ptxt: Left side drive shaft: 175 mm (6.89 in.)
Right side drive shaft: 144 mm (5.67 in.)

spec.title: Rear drive shaft boot fixing position “a” (Non-shift type 4WD model)
spec.ptxt: Left side drive shaft: 172 mm (6.77 in.)
Right side drive shaft: 142 mm (5.59 in.)
